1370: Herardus moved to Papenhofstede.A.3 after marriage.
Got married to Jute at age 18 in 1370.
Had a son with Jute, Thezonus, at age 18.
1371: Had a son with Jute, Meynolphus, at age 19.
1372: Had a daughter with Jute, Diewiven, at age 20.
1373: Had a son with Jute, Vandelghis, at age 21.
1376: Had a son with Jute, Iordanus, at age 24.
1377: Lost daughter Diewiven when Diewiven was 6 years old.
Lost son Iordanus when Iordanus was 2 years old.
1378: Had a son with Jute, Hylonus, at age 26.
1381: Had a son with Jute, Wilbord, at age 29.
1383: Lost son Hylonus when Hylonus was 6 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1386: Had a son with Jute, Folkero, at age 34.
1389: Lost daughter Moerseil when Moerseil was 0 years old.
Jute gave birth to their stillborn daughter Moerseil in 1389.
Lost son Vandelghis when Vandelghis was 17 years old.
1390: Had a son with Jute, Coekeа, at age 38.
